resumeSections.summary: I am a passionate Software Engineer and Cloud/DevOps practitioner with extensive experience in developing scalable cloud-native solutions. My expertise encompasses CI/CD best practices, Infrastructure as Code principles, and a strong command of multiple cloud platforms, positioning me as a versatile and innovative contributor to any engineering team.

achievements: Led the design and development of a project-resource planning solution that increased efficiency by 30%, employing Java 17 with Spring Framework and microservices architecture deployed through Kubernetes.
Integrated Kafka for asynchronous communications, enhancing system reliability and performance across multiple applications, while ensuring a responsive front end using React (TypeScript) and Redux.
Drove the development of an insurance claims portal using .NET Core 6 and ReactJS, improving user experience and operational efficiency for AXA Insurance.
Implemented automated CI/CD pipelines utilizing Azure DevOps, reducing deployment times by 40% and increasing the consistency of production environments through Infrastructure as Code templates.

Contributed to the development of an internal platform, applying Agile methodologies, and utilizing Java, Spring Boot, and AWS services, leading to improved team collaboration and reduced project timelines.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science (Major in Software Engineering)

certifications.name: CKAD â€“ Certified Kubernetes Application Developer

projects.name: Cross-Platform Aquaponics Mobile App
projects.description: Designed and built a mobile application to educate communities on sustainable aquaponics practices, effectively promoting local agricultural practices. Delivered both mobile and web interfaces, which significantly boosted community engagement in sustainable farming practices.

projects.name: Insurance Claims Portal
projects.description: Architected a cloud-based portal for processing insurance claims, optimizing digital workflows and improving claims processing time. Implemented CI/CD strategies that ensured quality and timely updates to the application.

achievements: Recipient of the Best Intern Award at BeWired for outstanding performance and contribution in software development projects.
Published a paper on cloud-native application design in the International Journal of Software Engineering.

volunteerWork: Volunteer tutor for coding and computer science topics in local schools.
professionalAffiliations: Member of the Belgian Computer Society
Participant in local DevOps meetups and workshops.
